title: Follow Your Heart!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>This is my first time at a bird park!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, well, they are pretty rare. But this place seems super fun~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You, it looks like we can take pictures with the penguins. We can even feed them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ooh, that sounds fun, let’s go, let’s go! Ah, wait, there’s a bird show.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Bird show? Like a bird holding a performance......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah, yeah. We’ll be able to meet eagles.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eagles can understand what humans are saying!? T-that’s amazing......!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Fufu, I don’t know where we should go first, though. Umi-chan, where do you wanna go?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Give me a moment. Let me think...... Ugh, this... this is not good! I can’t decide~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, there’s no need to get stressed over it~ Just follow your heart, and go full speed ahead!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
